item.title: The Land of Declining Sons | Sunday on 60 Minutes
item.description: Japan is experiencing a rapidly declining birth rate. This Sunday, Jon Wertheim reports on how the shrinking population is affecting the country and i...

item.title: Apr 21: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: Pope Francis dies at age 88; Tributes pour in as millions worldwide mourn the death of Pope Francis.

item.title: UPS cutting 20,000 jobs amid reduction in Amazon shipments
item.description: UPS on Tuesday announced it is planning to cut 20,000 jobs as part of its plan for workforce consolidation.

item.title: US Navy aircraft carrier loses $60M fighter jet in Red Sea
item.description: The F/A-18E Super Hornet was being towed Monday when it and the tug slipped and were lost in the Red Sea, the Navy said.
